body.p: {{tp351|Your task is to fill in the empty boxes based on the initial listening. We recommend to proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli352|Then, play the recording and try to capture the information concerning the incomplete texts. When listening, you can simultaneously fill in the correct answers.}}
{{tli353|Click on the empty gap, a blinking cursor appears.}}
{{tli354|Type in the text using your keyboard.}}
{{tli355|If you do not capture all the information, you can listen to the recording repeatedly.}}
{{tli356|Playing sound can be interrupted anytime by clicking Pause button and then continued by clicking Play button.}}
{{tli357|Recording can be played from any place you choose. By clicking recording indicator specify the point from which you wish to start playing. Then click Play button.}}
